trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Arlington
There were no other sightings in Arlington on or around September 19th 2009
divs: Sighting Details At first look the sky was very dark except for the bright shining light being given off from a white disk with pure white light being cast down from it in the shape of a very defined cone. The ring at the top of the cone had a defined thickness of ultra pure light. The ring at the top quickly blended into the rest of the cone which stayed bright white , with defined edges. Within seconds the lighted cone which was very large in the sky,began to dim leaving it to look like it was diffusing into the blackness of the sky. The bright light was withdrawn into the cone itself leaving only a white veil which appeared to look as if it was of a smoke like character. When it was gone there was only darkness. No sound or movement was felt or seen during the twenty or so seconds which this display took place.
Summary: Light from sky, disappeared into cloud of light that slowly faded away.
